title: Slug Document Schema
description: Slug resolver database. Intentionally simple; all logic about when and how to handle pointing slugs to different NOIDs should be found elsewhere.

type.description: Type of NOID this slug points to

allOf.description: NOID that the slug points to

aliases.description: If a slug needs to be changed (e.g. for a typo), the old slug can redirect to the new one if it's found here
